thread.title: Remember hot mug shot guy Jeremy Meeks? He's now a fully fledged model
thread.title_full: Remember hot mug shot guy Jeremy Meeks? He's now a fully fledged model

author: Amy Croffey
title: Remember hot mug shot guy Jeremy Meeks? He's now a fully fledged model
text:
He posed before the show topless. Advertisement 
"A criminal record is not something to be glamorised - but a reformed ex-con who happens to be criminally good-looking? That's one way to shake up a model casting moment," Vogue said. Photo gallery Celebrities are everywhere at New York Fashion Week 
Hinting he has more high-profile projects in the works, the day before the show, he took to his Instagram with 781,000 followers to share a picture with former editor-in-chief of Vogue Paris , Carine Roitfeld, with the caption: "It was great meeting you and your team, I so look forward to seeing you soon." 
She shared the same picture, writing: "My new friend." 
Meeks has tried to downplay the gravity of his charges, telling reporters he was not a "hardened criminal". 
But the June 2014 arrest was not Meeks' first brush with law enforcement. He previously served two years in state prison for a grand theft auto conviction. 
He will not reveal the meaning behind his teardrop tattoo but said he has done some things in his past he is not proud of. A post shared by JEREMY MEEKS (@jmeeksofficial) on Feb 12, 2017 at 2:01pm PST Related Content
